style.freeShipping: FREE SHIPPING ON ALL DOMESTIC ORDERS

newsletter.subscribeTitle: Subscribe to our newsletter to get updates to our latest collections
newsletter.subscribeSubtitle: Get 20% off on your first order just by subscribing to our newsletter

payment.options: Payment Options: We accept all major credit and debit cards, as well as PayPal and other secure payment methods. Your payment information is encrypted and secure.
payment.paymentOptionsDescription: We accept all major credit and debit cards, as well as PayPal and other secure payment methods. Your payment information is encrypted and secure.
payment.shippingDescription: We offer fast and reliable shipping options to ensure your order reaches you promptly. Shipping costs and delivery times vary depending on your location and the shipping method selected at checkout.

cart.emptySubtitle: Add items to your bag to see them here.
cart.addFavorites: Add your favorite items in it.

sorting.noItemsWithFiltersTitle: No items to show with these filters
sorting.noItemsWithFiltersSubtitle: Adjust filters or try looking for other products

products.noProductsToShowTitle: There are not products to show
products.noProductsToShowSubtitle: It seems we don't have any products available right now. Please consider exploring other departments or check back later for new arrivals.
products.noSearchResultsSubtitle: We couldn't find any products matching your search criteria. Please check your spelling, try using broader terms, or explore our popular categories for more options.
products.addToBagError: Unable to add the selected item to your bag. Please try again. If the issue persists, contact customer support.

info.title: Heavenly
info.about: Online brand clothing store Heavenly focuses on seling only qualify and branded items, limited edition collections by fashion designers

sizeGuide.title: Size Guide
sizeGuide.description: Find the perfect fit with our size guide. Use the measurements below to determine your ideal size for a comfortable and flattering fit.

favorites.description: View and manage your favorite products in one place.
